translated: It is not the establishment of the absence of different things.

original: blo dang sgra zhes bya ba ni bsdus pa'i don yin no //
analyzed: blo dang sgra zhes bya ba ni bsdus pa'i don yin no //
translated: The words ‚Äúmind‚Äù and ‚Äúsound‚Äù are the meaning of the compound.

original: dpe bstan pa ni /
analyzed: dpe bstan pa ni /
translated: The example is taught:

original: rgyal po mang pos bkur ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: rgyal po mang pos bkur ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: ‚ÄúThe king called Mahasammata‚Äù and so on.

original: rigs su bskrun pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: rigs su bskrun pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bskyed pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúBorn in the lineage‚Äù and so on is the production.

original: de'i phyir rgyal rigs su skyes pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de'i phyir rgyal rigs su skyes pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Therefore, the meaning is ‚Äúborn in the lineage of kings.‚Äù

original: 'dis ni 'das pa la 'jug pa'i dpe bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dis ni 'das pa la 'jug pa'i dpe bstan pa yin no //
translated: This teaches the example of engagement in the past.

original: 'khor los sgyur ba dung zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: 'khor los sgyur ba dung zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
translated: ‚ÄúThe cakravartin called Sa·πÖkha‚Äù and so on.

original: ji skad du gsung rab las bshad pa ni rgyal po mang pos bkur ba zhes pas gser gyi rin po che sna bdun mdun du 'gro ba dang tshad chen po'i mchod sdong chu bo gangg'a'i nang du gzhag pa dang rgyal po dung gis 'degs par 'gyur ba nyid
analyzed: ji skad du gsung rab las bshad pa ni rgyal po mang pos bkur ba zhes pas gser gyi rin po che sna bdun mdun du 'gro ba dang tshad chen po'i mchod sdong chu bo gangg'a'i nang du gzhag pa dang rgyal po dung gis 'degs par 'gyur ba nyid
translated: The scriptures state that the precious golden wheel of King MahƒÅsudar≈õana moved forward, the great pillar was placed in the Ganges River, and King Sa·πÖkha lifted it.

original: yin no zhes bya ba'i 'dis ni ma 'ongs pa 'jug pa'i dpe yin no //
analyzed: yin no zhes bya ba'i 'dis ni ma 'ongs pa 'jug pa'i dpe yin no //
translated: This is an example of the future.

original: 'khor los sgyur pa'i rgyal po dung zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: 'khor los sgyur pa'i rgyal po dung zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
translated: The scriptures state that King Sa·πÖkha, a cakravartin king, and so on,

original: 'di skad du yang gsung rab las bstan pa rgyal po mang pos bkur pa sprul pa ni sde pa gzhan gyi tshig gis bstan pa la brten pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di skad du yang gsung rab las bstan pa rgyal po mang pos bkur pa sprul pa ni sde pa gzhan gyi tshig gis bstan pa la brten pa yin no //
translated: also states that the emanation of King MahƒÅsudar≈õana relied on the teaching of other sects.

original: ri bong gi rva dag dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sgra tsam mo //
analyzed: ri bong gi rva dag dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sgra tsam mo //
translated: The words ‚Äúlike the horns of a rabbit‚Äù and so on are mere words.

original: gzugs bstan du yod pa dang thogs pa dang bcas pa dang zhes bya ba ni don du ma'i bya ba la 'jug pa yin no //
analyzed: gzugs bstan du yod pa dang thogs pa dang bcas pa dang zhes bya ba ni don du ma'i bya ba la 'jug pa yin no //
translated: The words ‚Äúvisible form that is demonstrable and impeded‚Äù and so on refer to engagement in many objects.

original: gzugs su bya ba de ni rnam par 'gyur ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gzugs su bya ba de ni rnam par 'gyur ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is: that which is capable of materiality is a transformation.

original: bstan pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa'i don yin no //
analyzed: bstan pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa'i don yin no //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúvisible‚Äù is the object of visual consciousness.

original: yod pa ni 'dir bstan pas bstan du yod pa'o //
analyzed: yod pa ni 'dir bstan pas bstan du yod pa'o //
translated: ‚Äú Visible‚Äù here means that which is visible by nature.

original: rang gi yul du @163b gzhan skyed pa la gegs byed pas na thogs pa dang bcas pa'i yod pa ste /
analyzed: rang gi yul du @163b gzhan skyed pa la gegs byed pas na thogs pa dang bcas pa'i yod pa ste /
translated: It is ‚Äúresistant‚Äù because it obstructs the arising of another in its own place.

original: thogs pa dang bcas pa'i phyir thogs pa dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: thogs pa dang bcas pa'i phyir thogs pa dang bcas pa'o //
translated: It is ‚Äúresistant‚Äù because it is resistant.

original: bum pa zhes bya ba ni don gcig bya ba byed pa rnams kyi 'jug pa'i dpe yin no //
analyzed: bum pa zhes bya ba ni don gcig bya ba byed pa rnams kyi 'jug pa'i dpe yin no //
translated: The word ‚Äúpot‚Äù is an example of the engagement of those who perform the same function.

original: bstan du yod pa la sogs pa smras pa ni sgra gcig gi dngos po'i yul yin no zhes bya ba ni ga las she na /
analyzed: bstan du yod pa la sogs pa smras pa ni sgra gcig gi dngos po'i yul yin no zhes bya ba ni ga las she na /
translated: The statement ‚Äúvisible, etc., are the objects of a single sound‚Äù is made because of what?

original: bstan du yod pa'i sgra zhes smos so //
analyzed: bstan du yod pa'i sgra zhes smos so //
translated: The statement ‚Äúthe sound ‚Äòvisible‚Äô‚Äù is made.

original: de dag sgra tha dad pa'i spyod yul la ni don ma yin no zhes ga las yin zhe na /
analyzed: de dag sgra tha dad pa'i spyod yul la ni don ma yin no zhes ga las yin zhe na /
translated: How is it that they are not the objects of a different sound?

original: gcig tu nye bar 'dus pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: gcig tu nye bar 'dus pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: The statement ‚Äúbecause they are combined into one‚Äù is made.

original: gcig la yang 'dus pa yin pa'i phyir gzhi mthun pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don yin no //
analyzed: gcig la yang 'dus pa yin pa'i phyir gzhi mthun pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don yin no //
translated: Because it is included in one, it is called a common locus, and so on.

original: de lta na gang kho na gzugs su bya ba de kho na bstan du yod pa yin la de nyid thogs pa dang bcas pa'i sgras bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta na gang kho na gzugs su bya ba de kho na bstan du yod pa yin la de nyid thogs pa dang bcas pa'i sgras bstan pa yin no //
translated: Thus, whatever is form is also demonstrable, and that is also what is indicated by the term obstructive.

original: 'dir gzhan gyis smras pa /
analyzed: 'dir gzhan gyis smras pa /
translated: In this regard, another says:üîΩEven though the object is diverse, the term is applied to it in a single way.

original: gal te yul sna tshogs su zin kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sna tshogs pa'i yul de dag gi sgra gcig tu nye bar bsdus pa de ni 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan zhes bya ba don gcig la 'du ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gal te yul sna tshogs su zin kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sna tshogs pa'i yul de dag gi sgra gcig tu nye bar bsdus pa de ni 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan zhes bya ba don gcig la 'du ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The reason for applying the term is the inclusion of those diverse objects in a single object.

original: de lta na gzugs nyid gang kho na la 'du ba de kho na la bstan du yod pa nyid dang / thogs pa dang bcas pa nyid ces bya ba de bzhin du gcig la nye bar bsdu ba'i mtshan nyid ni sgra'i don yin no //
analyzed: de lta na gzugs nyid gang kho na la 'du ba de kho na la bstan du yod pa nyid dang / thogs pa dang bcas pa nyid ces bya ba de bzhin du gcig la nye bar bsdu ba'i mtshan nyid ni sgra'i don yin no //
translated: Thus, whatever is form is also demonstrable and obstructive. In the same way, the meaning of a term is the characteristic that is included in one.

original: des na sgra'i don gyis 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan yin no //
analyzed: des na sgra'i don gyis 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan yin no //
translated: Therefore, the meaning of a term is the reason for applying the term.

original: de dang zhes pa ni sna tshogs pa'o //
analyzed: de dang zhes pa ni sna tshogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù refers to the various.üîΩTherefore, the meaning of the word ‚Äúvarious‚Äù is that the object is various.

original: de'i phyir yul sna tshogs pa nyid kyis 'di'i sgra'i don yin no zhes bya ba gzhan gyis bsams pa yin no //üîΩgrub pa'i mtha' smra ba bzhad gad ni /
analyzed: de'i phyir yul sna tshogs pa nyid kyis 'di'i sgra'i don yin no zhes bya ba gzhan gyis bsams pa yin no // grub pa'i mtha' smra ba bzhad gad ni /
translated: The proponent of tenets laughs:

original: ae ma'o dka' thub kyi sdug bsngal gyis nye bar dub pa zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: ae ma'o dka' thub kyi sdug bsngal gyis nye bar dub pa zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: ‚ÄúOh, how exhausted by the suffering of asceticism!‚Äù

original: kye ma dka' thub kyi sdug bsngal chen pos gdungs pa'i tshig gis don thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: kye ma dka' thub kyi sdug bsngal chen pos gdungs pa'i tshig gis don thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: The meaning is that he is exhausted by the great suffering of asceticism.üîΩBy what is the universal of smoke to be benefited? It is benefited by the existence of the one who benefits it.

original: gang gis na du ba'i spyi thog ma nas phan 'dogs par 'gyur la yod pas phan 'dogs par byed pa'i bka' drin gyis rang gi rjod par byed pas don shes par bya bar 'dod pas bu song la kho bo cag la gang phan 'dogs par byed pa yang
analyzed: gang gis na du ba'i spyi thog ma nas phan 'dogs par 'gyur la yod pas phan 'dogs par byed pa'i bka' drin gyis rang gi rjod par byed pas don shes par bya bar 'dod pas bu song la kho bo cag la gang phan 'dogs par byed pa yang
translated: The one who benefits it is the one who is grateful. The one who is grateful is the one who is to be known by the one who is to be benefited.üîΩThe one who is to be benefited is the son. The son should go and tell us who benefits him.

original: brjod par bya ba yin te /
analyzed: brjod par bya ba yin te /
translated: The one who benefits him is to be expressed.

original: de snyed pa bka' drin gyis phyag btsal ba gyis dang sgra'i bdag nyid rang gis 'jug pa'i phyir rigs pa 'di ni ches mang ba byed pa yin no //
analyzed: de snyed pa bka' drin gyis phyag btsal ba gyis dang sgra'i bdag nyid rang gis 'jug pa'i phyir rigs pa 'di ni ches mang ba byed pa yin no //
translated: Since the nature of sound is itself engaged, this reasoning is applied to a great extent.

original: 'on kyang de'i 'brel pa'i nus pa'i bye brag gis zhes @164a * //
analyzed: 'on kyang de'i 'brel pa'i nus pa'i bye brag gis zhes @164a * //
translated: However, it is said that by the specific power of its connection.

original: bya ba ni ji snyed pa 'di'i nus pa'i khyad par gang yin pa de ni spyi'i phan 'dogs par byed pa de snyed pa nyid nus pa'i bye brag la ci de ni sgra kun nas slong bar byed pa yin te /
analyzed: bya ba ni ji snyed pa 'di'i nus pa'i khyad par gang yin pa de ni spyi'i phan 'dogs par byed pa de snyed pa nyid nus pa'i bye brag la ci de ni sgra kun nas slong bar byed pa yin te /
translated: The specific power of this much is the general benefit, and that much is the specific power. What is the motivation of sound?

original: de ltar gyur pas yon tan ci zhig thob par 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar gyur pas yon tan ci zhig thob par 'gyur zhe na /
translated: If that is so, what quality is obtained?

original: de ltar 'dis brgyud pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de ltar 'dis brgyud pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: It is said that in this way, by the continuum, and so on.

original: gal te de'i nus pa'i bye brag gis sgra kun nas slong bor byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gal te de'i nus pa'i bye brag gis sgra kun nas slong bor byed pa ma yin te /
translated: If the specific power of that does not motivate sound,

original: yang na spyi las gzhan gyis kyang phan 'dogs par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: yang na spyi las gzhan gyis kyang phan 'dogs par byed pa yin te /
translated: or if the benefit is also from something other than the universal,

original: de'i tshe brgyud pas dub pa ni yongs su spangs pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i tshe brgyud pas dub pa ni yongs su spangs pa yin no //
translated: then the exhaustion of the continuum is completely abandoned.

original: lan 'ga' gzhan gyis smras pa gcig gis 'jug pa'i don gyi nus pa ni yod pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: lan 'ga' gzhan gyis smras pa gcig gis 'jug pa'i don gyi nus pa ni yod pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: But it is not the case that the power to engage the meaning of a word is sometimes spoken by another.

original: sgra sna tshogs skyed pa'i nus pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: sgra sna tshogs skyed pa'i nus pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: The response to that is ‚ÄúThe power to produce various sounds . . . .‚Äù

original: gal te 'di sna tshogs pa'i sgra 'jug par byed pa'i nus pa yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //üîΩde ji ltar du ma 'brel pas phan 'dogs par byed pa'i rgyu nus pa dang gcig par mtshungs par gyur pa yin no zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: gal te 'di sna tshogs pa'i sgra 'jug par byed pa'i nus pa yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro // de ji ltar du ma 'brel pas phan 'dogs par byed pa'i rgyu nus pa dang gcig par mtshungs par gyur pa yin no zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: If it is not the case that the power to engage various sounds exists,üîΩthen how is it that the cause that assists through a multiplicity of connections is similar to the power?

original: yang 'dir rgyu ci las gang gi dbang gis 'brel par phan 'dogs par byed pa ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: yang 'dir rgyu ci las gang gi dbang gis 'brel par phan 'dogs par byed pa ma yin zhe na /
translated: Also, in this regard, what is the cause from which the power to assist through a connection arises?

original: phan 'dogs par byed pa ma yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: phan 'dogs par byed pa ma yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: The response to that is ‚ÄúIt is not the case that . . . assistance . . . .‚Äù

original: gal te don de rnams phan 'dogs par byed par gang gis na khas blangs pa yin /
analyzed: gal te don de rnams phan 'dogs par byed par gang gis na khas blangs pa yin /
translated: If those objects assist, then why is it accepted that they assist?

original: de dag gis 'di'i 'brel pa nyid kyang mi 'grub pa ste ji skad bshad pa'i don gcig tu 'du ba dang gzhi mthun pas yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de dag gis 'di'i 'brel pa nyid kyang mi 'grub pa ste ji skad bshad pa'i don gcig tu 'du ba dang gzhi mthun pas yin no zhe na /
translated: They do not establish the connection of this, because of the collection of the one meaning as it has been explained and the common locus.

original: gal te don gcig tu 'du pa dang gzhi mthun par gyur ba ni gzugs dang dri dang ro dang reg bya ni don gcig tu 'du ba yin na de'i sgra yang gzhi mthun par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te don gcig tu 'du pa dang gzhi mthun par gyur ba ni gzugs dang dri dang ro dang reg bya ni don gcig tu 'du ba yin na de'i sgra yang gzhi mthun par 'gyur ro //
translated: If the collection of the one meaning and the common locus were to occur, then form, smell, taste, and tactility would be the collection of the one meaning, and their sound would be the common locus.

original: de bum pa yang gzhan 'ga' zhig gis rdzas gzhan brtags pa de dang de ni dgag par bya ba'i don ni bum pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de bum pa yang gzhan 'ga' zhig gis rdzas gzhan brtags pa de dang de ni dgag par bya ba'i don ni bum pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Also, some other person would imagine that the vase is another substance. That is to be refuted. The meaning is stated in the words ‚Äúvase‚Äù and so on.

original: gzugs la sogs pa nyid ni sa dang chu 'dzin pa la sogs pa rnams dang dbyibs dang sbrang rtsi dang chu la sogs pa'i longs spyod pa'i don gyi bya ba gcig byed pa bum pa'i sgrar brjod pa med pa'i don gzhan ci zhig bum par brtag par bya
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa nyid ni sa dang chu 'dzin pa la sogs pa rnams dang dbyibs dang sbrang rtsi dang chu la sogs pa'i longs spyod pa'i don gyi bya ba gcig byed pa bum pa'i sgrar brjod pa med pa'i don gzhan ci zhig bum par brtag par bya
translated: Form and so on are the same as earth, water, and so on, and the shape, honey, water, and so on are the same as the function of enjoyment. There is no expression of the word ‚Äúvase‚Äù that performs the one action. What other object that is not the meaning of form and so on should be imagined as a vase?

original: / gzhan 'ga' zhig gi mang po rnams gcig gi don gyi bya ba byed pa nyid smras pa yod pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: / gzhan 'ga' zhig gi mang po rnams gcig gi don gyi bya ba byed pa nyid smras pa yod pa ni ma yin te /
translated: But it is not the case that many things are said to perform the function of one thing.

original: mang po yod du zin kyang zhes bya ba @164b la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: mang po yod du zin kyang zhes bya ba @164b la sogs pa smos te /
translated: In response to this, the opponent says, ‚ÄúEven though many things exist, etc.

original: mang po rnams kyang don gcig gi bya ba byed pa nyid mthong ba yin te /
analyzed: mang po rnams kyang don gcig gi bya ba byed pa nyid mthong ba yin te /
translated: Many things are seen to perform the function of one thing.

original: 'di lta ste gzugs dang dbang po dang snang ba dang yid la byed pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rgyu yin te /
analyzed: 'di lta ste gzugs dang dbang po dang snang ba dang yid la byed pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rgyu yin te /
translated: For example, form, the sense faculty, light, and mental attention are the causes of visual consciousness.

original: des kyang de nus par bsal ba yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang don gyi bya ba gcig byed pa'i phyir ro //üîΩgal te mang po rnams la yang gcig sgra sbyor ba la spyon yod par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: des kyang de nus par bsal ba yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang don gyi bya ba gcig byed pa'i phyir ro // gal te mang po rnams la yang gcig sgra sbyor ba la spyon yod par mi 'gyur te /
translated: And it is established that they are capable of that, etc.üîΩ  If many things are applied to one thing, the term ‚Äúmany‚Äù would not exist.

original: de la de dag la dgos pa med par gyur na mang po rnams la gcig gi sgra sbyor ba ci yin zhe na /
analyzed: de la de dag la dgos pa med par gyur na mang po rnams la gcig gi sgra sbyor ba ci yin zhe na /
translated: If there is no need for that, why is the term ‚Äúmany‚Äù applied to many things?

original: dgos pa med pa'i don la sgra sbyor bar mi byed de zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: dgos pa med pa'i don la sgra sbyor bar mi byed de zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: In response to this, the opponent says, ‚ÄúOne does not apply a term to an object that has no purpose, etc.

original: dgos pa med na 'jig rten pa don la sgra sbyor ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: dgos pa med na 'jig rten pa don la sgra sbyor ba ni ma yin no //
translated: If there is no purpose, then the world does not employ a word in reference to an object.

original: de yang dgos pa gtso bor bya ba la nus pa med na yongs su spang bar bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de yang dgos pa gtso bor bya ba la nus pa med na yongs su spang bar bya ba yin no //
translated: And that purpose is to be abandoned if it is not the principal activity.

original: so sor gzugs la sogs pa rnams la sgras nges par sbyor ba ni sgra'i phreng ba chen por 'gyur ro //
analyzed: so sor gzugs la sogs pa rnams la sgras nges par sbyor ba ni sgra'i phreng ba chen por 'gyur ro //
translated: If one were to employ a word in reference to each individual form, etc., there would be a great series of words.

original: gzugs la sogs pa so sor nus pa med pa'i don gyi bya ba gcig byed pa ni dngos pos byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa so sor nus pa med pa'i don gyi bya ba gcig byed pa ni dngos pos byed pa ma yin te /
translated: The activity of an object which is not capable of being done by each individual form, etc., is not done by a substance.

original: gcig gis kyang tshogs pa'i sgra de'i don shes pas gzugs la sogs pa'i sgra don med pa nyid de /
analyzed: gcig gis kyang tshogs pa'i sgra de'i don shes pas gzugs la sogs pa'i sgra don med pa nyid de /
translated: Since the meaning of the word ‚Äúcollection‚Äù is understood by one, the words ‚Äúform,‚Äù etc., are meaningless.

original: bstan bcos byed pa rang nyid kyis dgos pa bstan pa ni /
analyzed: bstan bcos byed pa rang nyid kyis dgos pa bstan pa ni /
translated: The author of the treatise himself teaches the purpose:

original: de la don gang yin pa lhan cig gam dad pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de la don gang yin pa lhan cig gam dad pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: In that regard, whatever the purpose is, whether it is simultaneous or successive, etc.

original: lhan cig pa ni dgos pa gcig pa ste /
analyzed: lhan cig pa ni dgos pa gcig pa ste /
translated: Simultaneous means having the same purpose.

original: dper na gzugs dang dri dang ro dang reg bya chu la sogs pa btung ba byed pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na gzugs dang dri dang ro dang reg bya chu la sogs pa btung ba byed pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, form, smell, taste, and the tangible are drunk in water, etc.

original: tha dad pa'i dgos pa gcig pa ni dper na gzugs la sogs pa de nyid so sor bdag nyid kyi 'bras bu la chags pa la sogs pa'i bya ba ci zhig yod /
analyzed: tha dad pa'i dgos pa gcig pa ni dper na gzugs la sogs pa de nyid so sor bdag nyid kyi 'bras bu la chags pa la sogs pa'i bya ba ci zhig yod /
translated: What is the single purpose of the different words? For example, the words form and so on are the words of the result of each individual word.

original: de dag gis de rnams kyi dgos pa gcig byed pa gsal bar byed pa yin te /
analyzed: de dag gis de rnams kyi dgos pa gcig byed pa gsal bar byed pa yin te /
translated: They clarify the single purpose of those words.

original: gang gi tshe sgra gcig gis nges par sbyor ba la nyes pa ci zhig yod /
analyzed: gang gi tshe sgra gcig gis nges par sbyor ba la nyes pa ci zhig yod /
translated: If one word is definitely applied, what is wrong with that?

original: de la de ltar ni 'gyur na ji ltar mang po rnams la bum pa zhes bya ba'i tshig gcig pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: de la de ltar ni 'gyur na ji ltar mang po rnams la bum pa zhes bya ba'i tshig gcig pa yin zhe na /
translated: If that is so, how can the word pot be the same for many?üîΩThe words that express the performance of a purpose are applied to the collection because they indicate the capacity to perform a single purpose.

original: don bya ba byed pa'i sgras bstan pa la sogs pa ni de'i don gcig byed pa'i nus pa bstan pa'i phyir gang gi tshe tshogs pa'i sgra nges par sbyar bar bya ba de'i tshe de la tshig gcig kyang 'gal ba med do //
analyzed: don bya ba byed pa'i sgras bstan pa la sogs pa ni de'i don gcig byed pa'i nus pa bstan pa'i phyir gang gi tshe tshogs pa'i sgra nges par sbyar bar bya ba de'i tshe de la tshig gcig kyang 'gal ba med do //
translated: When the word collection is definitely applied, then there is no contradiction in that word being a single word.

original: tshogs pa la gcig gi yin no zhes bya bar dgongs pa yin no //üîΩtshogs pa nyid la gcig @165a * //
analyzed: tshogs pa la gcig gi yin no zhes bya bar dgongs pa yin no // tshogs pa nyid la gcig @165a * //
translated: The thought is that it belongs to the collection.

original: gis ci zhig byed snyam nas /
analyzed: gis ci zhig byed snyam nas /
translated: What does the single word do for the collection?

original: lhan cig pa'i nus pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: lhan cig pa'i nus pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: The response to that is: ‚ÄúThe capacity of the collection, etc.‚Äù

original: lhan cig pa nyid kyis gzugs la sogs pa de ni chu 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i don gyi bya ba byed pa ni gcig tu byed pa yin te so sor ni ma yin no //
analyzed: lhan cig pa nyid kyis gzugs la sogs pa de ni chu 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i don gyi bya ba byed pa ni gcig tu byed pa yin te so sor ni ma yin no //
translated: The form, etc., that is the collection is the single agent of the activity of the object, such as the apprehension of water, etc. It is not individual.

original: de yang ji ltar gyur ba'i nus pa dang bcas pa de ltar gyur pa ni /
analyzed: de yang ji ltar gyur ba'i nus pa dang bcas pa de ltar gyur pa ni /
translated: And that is the collection that has the capacity that is the way it is.

original: shin tu skyes pa ni tha dad pa gcig tu tshogs pas yin no //
analyzed: shin tu skyes pa ni tha dad pa gcig tu tshogs pas yin no //
translated: It is the single collection that is the way it is, because it is the collection of the individual things that are the way they are.

original: gcig gi tshe tshogs par gyur pa dang tshogs pa'i tshig gcig gi bum pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'gal ba yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gcig gi tshe tshogs par gyur pa dang tshogs pa'i tshig gcig gi bum pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'gal ba yod pa ma yin no //
translated: There is no contradiction in the single word ‚Äúcollection‚Äù being used for the collection at the time of the collection and for the individual things that are the collection.

original: 'on te rigs kyi sgra 'di yang shing la sogs pa'i sgra bzhin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te rigs kyi sgra 'di yang shing la sogs pa'i sgra bzhin no zhe na /
translated: But this word ‚Äúcollection‚Äù is like the word ‚Äútree,‚Äù etc.

original: bden te / bsal ba gzhan la ltos pa'i rigs kyi sgra yin na /
analyzed: bden te / bsal ba gzhan la ltos pa'i rigs kyi sgra yin na /
translated: That is true, but the word ‚Äúcollection‚Äù is the word ‚Äúcollection‚Äù in dependence on other eliminations.

original: gzugs la sogs pa 'dus pa dag la ltos pa ni 'dus pa'i sgra yin no //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa 'dus pa dag la ltos pa ni 'dus pa'i sgra yin no //
translated: The word ‚Äúcollection‚Äù is in dependence on the collection of form, etc.

original: de lta na yang kha cig ni rigs kyi sgra nyid yin te /
analyzed: de lta na yang kha cig ni rigs kyi sgra nyid yin te /
translated: Even so, for some, it is the word ‚Äúcollection‚Äù itself.

original: bde ba la sogs pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: bde ba la sogs pa lta bu'o //
translated: like ‚Äúpleasure‚Äù and so on.

original: kha cig ni 'dus pa'i sgra yin te /
analyzed: kha cig ni 'dus pa'i sgra yin te /
translated: Some are the sound of a collection,

original: dper na skyes pa zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na skyes pa zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: like ‚Äúman‚Äù and so on.

original: kha cig ni gnyis ka yin te /
analyzed: kha cig ni gnyis ka yin te /
translated: Some are both,

original: dper na shing la sogs pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na shing la sogs pa lta bu'o //
translated: like ‚Äútree‚Äù and so on.

original: rigs kyi sgra brjod pa tha dad par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: rigs kyi sgra brjod pa tha dad par bstan pa ni /
translated: The statement that the sound of a class is different is

original: rigs kyi sgra'i don zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: rigs kyi sgra'i don zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: the meaning of the sound of a class and so on.

original: rigs kyi sgra ni shing la sogs pa'i sgra yin no //
analyzed: rigs kyi sgra ni shing la sogs pa'i sgra yin no //
translated: The sound of a class is the sound of a tree and so on.

original: de'i don res 'ga' lhan cig pa'i nus pa 'am /
analyzed: de'i don res 'ga' lhan cig pa'i nus pa 'am /
translated: Sometimes the meaning of that is the power of the collection,

original: res 'ga' so sor yin no //
analyzed: res 'ga' so sor yin no //
translated: sometimes it is the power of each.

original: sna tshogs pa dang lhan cig pa de rnams kyi nus pa yin te /
analyzed: sna tshogs pa dang lhan cig pa de rnams kyi nus pa yin te /
translated: The power of those is various and collected.

original: de'i phyir sna tshogs pa'i nus pa yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir sna tshogs pa'i nus pa yin te /
translated: Therefore, the power is various.

original: mang po rnams la mang po'i tshig dang gcig la gcig gi bya'o //
analyzed: mang po rnams la mang po'i tshig dang gcig la gcig gi bya'o //
translated: The word for many is used for many, and the word for one is used for one.

original: gcig gi nus pa brjod par 'dod na ni /
analyzed: gcig gi nus pa brjod par 'dod na ni /
translated: If one wishes to express the power of one,

original: gcig gi tshig can gyi shing zhes bya'o //
analyzed: gcig gi tshig can gyi shing zhes bya'o //
translated: the word for one, ‚Äútree,‚Äù is used.

original: 'di ni mtshan nyid byed pa'i 'dod pa'i rjes su 'brangs nas byas pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'di ni mtshan nyid byed pa'i 'dod pa'i rjes su 'brangs nas byas pa yin no zhe na /
translated: This is done following the desire of those who posit the definition.

original: kha cig ni de dag ni nges pa yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: kha cig ni de dag ni nges pa yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Some say: Those are certain.

original: khyed cag ni rgyu'i nges pa de ltar byed pa yin te /
analyzed: khyed cag ni rgyu'i nges pa de ltar byed pa yin te /
translated: You posit the certainty of the cause in that way,

original: mang po rnams la mang po'i tshig dang gcig la gcig gi tshig tu 'dod pas de'i bsam pa de dag bshad do //
analyzed: mang po rnams la mang po'i tshig dang gcig la gcig gi tshig tu 'dod pas de'i bsam pa de dag bshad do //
translated: because you assert that the word for many is used for many and the word for one is used for one.

original: 'o na ni khyed kyi ji ltar yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ni khyed kyi ji ltar yin zhe na /
translated: But what about you?

original: kho bo cag ni brdar btags pa'i don de dag ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: kho bo cag ni brdar btags pa'i don de dag ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: We say: Those are the meanings of the terms that are designated.

original: kho bo cag gi sgra dang don rtag tu 'brel par ni med kyi 'on kyang brdas yin no //
analyzed: kho bo cag gi sgra dang don rtag tu 'brel par ni med kyi 'on kyang brdas yin no //
translated: We do not say that terms and their meanings are always related, but rather that they are related through designation.

original: de la 'dod pas rab tu brtags pa brda bstan pas sgra'i tha snyad du shin tu mngon @165b par zhen pa yin no //
analyzed: de la 'dod pas rab tu brtags pa brda bstan pas sgra'i tha snyad du shin tu mngon @165b par zhen pa yin no //
translated: Since the desire for that is imputed, the term is indicated and one becomes very attached to verbal conventions.üîΩAnticipating others' assertions

original: gzhan gyi 'dod pa'i dogs pa bsu pa ni /
analyzed: gzhan gyi 'dod pa'i dogs pa bsu pa ni /
translated: Anticipating other objectionsüîΩ

original: gzugs la sogs pa du ma'i sgra zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /üîΩdu ma'i gzugs la sogs pa sgra gcig gi don nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa du ma'i sgra zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te / du ma'i gzugs la sogs pa sgra gcig gi don nyid ma yin no //
translated: The opponent‚Äôs position is stated in the lines beginning ‚ÄúThe term ‚Äòsound‚Äô is applied to many things, such as visible forms.‚ÄùüîΩThe term ‚Äúsound‚Äù is not applied to the referent of a single thing, such as a visible form.

original: gzhan gyi nus pa yod pa ma yin pa de'i phyir sgra gcig gi brjod par bya ba nyid du mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba phyogs snga ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan gyi nus pa yod pa ma yin pa de'i phyir sgra gcig gi brjod par bya ba nyid du mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba phyogs snga ma yin no //
translated: Since there is no other capacity, the term ‚Äúsound‚Äù cannot be applied to a single referent.

original: 'dir grub pa'i mtha' smra bas /üîΩci skyes bu'i 'jug pa la ltos pa med par zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /üîΩci skyes bu'i 'dod pa la ltos pa med par don la sgra 'jug par byed pa yin nam /üîΩyang na skyes bu'i don du gnyer ba rnams sgra'i tha snyad ma nges par sbyor ba yin /
analyzed: 'dir grub pa'i mtha' smra bas / ci skyes bu'i 'jug pa la ltos pa med par zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te / ci skyes bu'i 'dod pa la ltos pa med par don la sgra 'jug par byed pa yin nam / yang na skyes bu'i don du gnyer ba rnams sgra'i tha snyad ma nges par sbyor ba yin /
translated: Here the Proponents of Entity state:üîΩ‚ÄúDo sounds apply to objects without regard to the wishes of beings?üîΩOr do beings who seek the referents of sounds apply the conventions of terms without certainty?‚Äù

original: gal te rang nyid kyi nus pa yin na ni /
analyzed: gal te rang nyid kyi nus pa yin na ni /
translated: If sounds apply to objects without regard to the wishes of beings,üîΩthen the term ‚Äúsound‚Äù would not be applied to the referent of a single thing, such as a visible form.

original: rab kun nas slong bar byed pa'i nus pa yod dam zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gang gi tshe don rang nyid kyis sgra 'jug par bzod pa gang yin pa de'i tshe de rnams nus pa dang mi nus pa rnam par dpyad par bya ba yin no
analyzed: rab kun nas slong bar byed pa'i nus pa yod dam zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gang gi tshe don rang nyid kyis sgra 'jug par bzod pa gang yin pa de'i tshe de rnams nus pa dang mi nus pa rnam par dpyad par bya ba yin no
translated: If one asks, Is there the capacity to motivate? and so on, then when the meaning itself is able to tolerate the engagement of the term, at that time it is to be analyzed whether or not there is the capacity.

original: // rang nyid kun nas slong bar byed pa la nyes pa ci zhig yod ce na /
analyzed: // rang nyid kun nas slong bar byed pa la nyes pa ci zhig yod ce na /
translated: If one asks, what is wrong with motivating oneself?

original: de yang rigs pa ma yin no zhe na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de yang rigs pa ma yin no zhe na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: He says, That also is not logical, and so on.

original: gang gi tshe don rang gi nus pa nyid kyis sgra kun nas slong bar byed pa yin pas de'i tshe skyes bus brjod par 'dod pa ma yin yang kha'i bu ga las don la yod pa'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gi tshe don rang gi nus pa nyid kyis sgra kun nas slong bar byed pa yin pas de'i tshe skyes bus brjod par 'dod pa ma yin yang kha'i bu ga las don la yod pa'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: When the meaning itself motivates the term by its own capacity, then at that time the sound that exists in the meaning would emerge from the throat of a person even when he does not wish to speak.

original: skyes bu dang 'brel par bstan pa dag bshad pa'i phyir /
analyzed: skyes bu dang 'brel par bstan pa dag bshad pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to explain the teachings that are related to a person, he says,

original: skyes bus de dag la nye bar sbyor ba na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: skyes bus de dag la nye bar sbyor ba na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: when a person applies them, and so on.

original: gang gi tshe skyes bu nges par sbyor ba de'i tshe de ji ltar 'dod par nges par sbyor ba na mang po la yang gcig gi tshig tu bum pa zhes brjod pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: gang gi tshe skyes bu nges par sbyor ba de'i tshe de ji ltar 'dod par nges par sbyor ba na mang po la yang gcig gi tshig tu bum pa zhes brjod pa lta bu'o //
translated: When a person definitely applies a name, then, when he applies it as he wishes, he uses the word ‚Äúvase‚Äù for many things, as if it were the word for one thing.

original: gcig gi mtha' can gyis brjod par bya ba med pa yin na de ci la dmigs par 'gyur /
analyzed: gcig gi mtha' can gyis brjod par bya ba med pa yin na de ci la dmigs par 'gyur /
translated: If the word has an ending for the singular, and there is no object, then what would it refer to?

original: de dag de ltar ni 'gyur na brjod par bya ba dgos pa ci zhig yin zhe na /
analyzed: de dag de ltar ni 'gyur na brjod par bya ba dgos pa ci zhig yin zhe na /
translated: If they were like that, what would be the purpose of the object of expression?

original: rgyu mtshan nges par sbyor ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: rgyu mtshan nges par sbyor ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: He says, ‚ÄúThe purpose of applying a name is to indicate the reason, etc.‚ÄùüîΩThus, having explained the purpose of applying names to things, he says, ‚ÄúWhen many things appear as if they were one action, then the word for one is used. When many individual actions are seen, then the word for many is used.‚Äù

original: de ltar sgra rnams kyi nges par sbyor ba'i dgos pa bshad nas gcig gam yang na mang po rnams bya ba gcig tu snang ba na gcig gi tshig dang so sor bya ba byed pa snang ba na mang po la mang po'i tshig dang / gzhan yang rgyu nye bar bsags pa bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de ltar sgra rnams kyi nges par sbyor ba'i dgos pa bshad nas gcig gam yang na mang po rnams bya ba gcig tu snang ba na gcig gi tshig dang so sor bya ba byed pa snang ba na mang po la mang po'i tshig dang / gzhan yang rgyu nye bar bsags pa bstan pa ni /
translated: He also teaches the accumulation of causes:

original: gal te gzugs la sogs pa dag ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: gal te gzugs la sogs pa dag ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: ‚ÄúIf form, etc., are the basis of the word, etc.‚Äù

original: gang @166a * //
analyzed: gang @166a * //
translated: What is that?

original: tshe dus ma yin pa'i phyir gzugs la sogs pa ni gang gi tshe sgra gcig gis lhan cig tu 'brel pa yin pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: tshe dus ma yin pa'i phyir gzugs la sogs pa ni gang gi tshe sgra gcig gis lhan cig tu 'brel pa yin pa de'i tshe /
translated: Because life is not untimely, form and so on are related to sound at the same time.

original: de gcig la brten pa yin par ci gang gis brtag par bya /
analyzed: de gcig la brten pa yin par ci gang gis brtag par bya /
translated: When that is so, how can it be imagined that it is related to one or the other?

original: des na cha shas dang 'brel pas ni ma yin no //
analyzed: des na cha shas dang 'brel pas ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is not related by parts.

original: de lta na yang khyed kyis mang po rnams la gcig dang lhan cig 'brel pa khas blangs kyang de dag dang rdzas kyis kyang de rnams 'brel par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta na yang khyed kyis mang po rnams la gcig dang lhan cig 'brel pa khas blangs kyang de dag dang rdzas kyis kyang de rnams 'brel par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Even so, although you accept that many are related to one, they are not related by substance.

original: de'i phyir yul 'ga' zhig tu gcig kyang lhan cig tu gzugs la sogs pa dang / 'brel pa skyed du zin kyang sgra yis lhan cig tu khas blangs pa'i phyir med par 'dzin pa la dga' bar bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir yul 'ga' zhig tu gcig kyang lhan cig tu gzugs la sogs pa dang / 'brel pa skyed du zin kyang sgra yis lhan cig tu khas blangs pa'i phyir med par 'dzin pa la dga' bar bshad pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, although it is produced related to form and so on in some place, it is not related to sound because it is accepted as simultaneous. This explains the delight in apprehending nonexistence.

original: 'dir gzhan gyis smras pa /
analyzed: 'dir gzhan gyis smras pa /
translated: Here an opponent says:

original: kho bo cag ni gcig dang 'brel pa 'gal ba yin pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni kho bo cag gi gcig dang du ma gcig dang lhan cig 'brel pa 'gal ba yod pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: kho bo cag ni gcig dang 'brel pa 'gal ba yin pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni kho bo cag gi gcig dang du ma gcig dang lhan cig 'brel pa 'gal ba yod pa ni ma yin te /
translated: We do not say that the one and the many are mutually exclusive,

original: gcig gi sgra ni gzugs la sogs pa dag ni mi 'dod kyang 'on kyang gzugs la sogs pa de thams cad 'dus pa de rnams tha mi dad pa yin no //
analyzed: gcig gi sgra ni gzugs la sogs pa dag ni mi 'dod kyang 'on kyang gzugs la sogs pa de thams cad 'dus pa de rnams tha mi dad pa yin no //
translated: but the term ‚Äúone‚Äù is not asserted to be form and so on. However, all of those forms and so on are not different from that collection.

original: tha mi dad pa rnams kyang du ma'i dngos po'i don byed pa 'gal ba yin gyi /
analyzed: tha mi dad pa rnams kyang du ma'i dngos po'i don byed pa 'gal ba yin gyi /
translated: And it is contradictory for that which is not different to perform the function of a thing that is many.

original: de yang bum pa las gos la sogs pa'i don gyi bya ba byed pa mi srid pa gang yin pa de ni tshogs pa gzhan la don gyi bya ba byed pa srid par gyur bas snam bu rang gi ngo bos gzugs la sogs pa byed pa ni ma
analyzed: de yang bum pa las gos la sogs pa'i don gyi bya ba byed pa mi srid pa gang yin pa de ni tshogs pa gzhan la don gyi bya ba byed pa srid par gyur bas snam bu rang gi ngo bos gzugs la sogs pa byed pa ni ma
translated: Moreover, it is impossible for a vase to perform the function of a thing such as cloth. Since it is possible for another collection to perform the function of a thing, a cloth is not by its very nature the cause of form and so on.

original: yin te / bum pa'i rang gi ngo bo'i gzugs la sogs pa dang tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yin te / bum pa'i rang gi ngo bo'i gzugs la sogs pa dang tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because the form and so on of a vase is not different from it.

original: gang gi tshe de skad du bshad zin pa'i gnas skabs kyi gcig pa ni tha dad pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi tshe de skad du bshad zin pa'i gnas skabs kyi gcig pa ni tha dad pa ma yin no //
translated: When it is said that the one in the situation explained is not different,

original: de bzhin du ji ltar gcig byed pa de bstan pa'i ched du sgra gcig gis kyang brjod par mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni phyogs snga ma yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du ji ltar gcig byed pa de bstan pa'i ched du sgra gcig gis kyang brjod par mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni phyogs snga ma yin no //
translated: in the same way, it is not to be said that even by one word, just as it is one, it is to be expressed. This is the former position.

original: 'dir grub pa'i mtha' smra bas smras pa zin du chug kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: 'dir grub pa'i mtha' smra bas smras pa zin du chug kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Here, the proponent of the conclusion says, ‚ÄúEven if it is allowed,‚Äù and so on.

original: yod du chug kyang 'ga' zhig yid la 'dod pa 'di thams cad chogs pa rnams gzugs la sogs pa gcig gi ngo bor 'gyur ro snyam na ni de lta na yang phan tshun rnam par dben pa'i ngo bor mngon sum gyis 'dzin pa yin no //üîΩde dag tha mi dad pa yin na ci ste /
analyzed: yod du chug kyang 'ga' zhig yid la 'dod pa 'di thams cad chogs pa rnams gzugs la sogs pa gcig gi ngo bor 'gyur ro snyam na ni de lta na yang phan tshun rnam par dben pa'i ngo bor mngon sum gyis 'dzin pa yin no // de dag tha mi dad pa yin na ci ste /
translated: Even if it is allowed, if all of these things that are desired by some are a single entity of form and so on, then also they are apprehended by direct perception as having an essence that is mutually exclusive.

original: 'dzin par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: 'dzin par mi 'gyur /
translated: If they are not different, why are they not apprehended?

original: ci ste btang snyoms su byed par 'gyur /
analyzed: ci ste btang snyoms su byed par 'gyur /
translated: Why are they treated with indifference?

original: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being shown:

original: gal te @166b gzugs la sogs pa tha dad pa la mngon sum gyis gzugs la sogs pa tha mi dad pa ci ste mi 'dzin par mngon sum gyis phan tshun rnam par dben pa'i ngo bo yang ci ste so sor snang bar 'gyur //
analyzed: gal te @166b gzugs la sogs pa tha dad pa la mngon sum gyis gzugs la sogs pa tha mi dad pa ci ste mi 'dzin par mngon sum gyis phan tshun rnam par dben pa'i ngo bo yang ci ste so sor snang bar 'gyur //
translated: If form and so on are different, why doesn‚Äôt direct perception apprehend form and so on as different? Why does direct perception separately appear as the nature of mutual exclusion?

original: de dag ni tha mi dad pa'i ngo bo yin pa'i bsags pa'i rgyu na ni 'di ni 'dod par mi bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de dag ni tha mi dad pa'i ngo bo yin pa'i bsags pa'i rgyu na ni 'di ni 'dod par mi bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: ‚Äú That they have an undifferentiated nature is unacceptable‚Äù and so on.

original: gang tha mi dad pa'i rang gi ngo bo gzugs la sogs pa de dag ni 'dod par mi bya'o //
analyzed: gang tha mi dad pa'i rang gi ngo bo gzugs la sogs pa de dag ni 'dod par mi bya'o //
translated: That form and so on have an undifferentiated nature is unacceptable.

original: gang gi phyir tshogs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin de dag tha dad par dmigs te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir tshogs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin de dag tha dad par dmigs te /
translated: Because the nature of all collections is observed to be different.

original: de lta na yang bu ram gyi kha dog smug pa yang ro mngar ba dang / ba sha ka ni ser ba'i ngo bo yang ro kha ba dang / ga bur la dri zhim pa dang / mi gtsang ba'i dri mi zhim pa dang / ras bal la ni 'jam pa dang /
analyzed: de lta na yang bu ram gyi kha dog smug pa yang ro mngar ba dang / ba sha ka ni ser ba'i ngo bo yang ro kha ba dang / ga bur la dri zhim pa dang / mi gtsang ba'i dri mi zhim pa dang / ras bal la ni 'jam pa dang /
translated: Even so, the color of molasses is brown and its taste is sweet, the color of sugar is white and its taste is bitter, camphor has a good smell, feces have a bad smell, cotton is soft, and thorns are rough.

original: kha cig ni rig bya rtsub pa zhes bya ba 'di lta bu la sogs pa de ji ltar gzugs la sogs pa rnams gcig yin zhes brjod par bya /
analyzed: kha cig ni rig bya rtsub pa zhes bya ba 'di lta bu la sogs pa de ji ltar gzugs la sogs pa rnams gcig yin zhes brjod par bya /
translated: Some say: The object of knowledge is coarse, and so on. How can form and so on be one?

original: gzhan gyis yang gal ta gzugs la sogs pa dag las gzhan zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: gzhan gyis yang gal ta gzugs la sogs pa dag las gzhan zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Another says: If it is different from form and so on, and so on.

original: bum pa dang gzugs la sogs pa dag las tha dad pa yin na nyes pa ci zhig yod ces bya ba yin no //
analyzed: bum pa dang gzugs la sogs pa dag las tha dad pa yin na nyes pa ci zhig yod ces bya ba yin no //
translated: If it is distinct from a vase and form and so on, what is the fault?

original: grub pa'i mtha' smra bas /
analyzed: grub pa'i mtha' smra bas /
translated: The proponent of tenets says:

original: de mngon sum du yod pa yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de mngon sum du yod pa yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: It is directly perceptible.

original: gal te gzugs la sogs pa las tha dad pa'i bum pa yin par gyur na de'i tshe mngon sum gyis gzugs la sogs pa las rnam par dben pa ci ste so sor snang bar mi 'gyur /
analyzed: gal te gzugs la sogs pa las tha dad pa'i bum pa yin par gyur na de'i tshe mngon sum gyis gzugs la sogs pa las rnam par dben pa ci ste so sor snang bar mi 'gyur /
translated: If a vase were different from form and so on, then why would it not be separately perceptible by direct perception, isolated from form and so on?

original: de lta na 'dir gzugs la sogs pa'i mi mthun par mngon sum du 'dod do //
analyzed: de lta na 'dir gzugs la sogs pa'i mi mthun par mngon sum du 'dod do //
translated: In that case, it is asserted that a vase is directly perceptible as different from form and so on.

original: de ltar ni 'gyur na mngon sum gyis kyang 'ga' zhig gdon mi za bar rnam par dben pa so sor snang ba ni mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar ni 'gyur na mngon sum gyis kyang 'ga' zhig gdon mi za bar rnam par dben pa so sor snang ba ni mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If that were so, then direct perception would not at all appear to be separate.

original: gzugs la sogs pa'i so sor snang ba tha dad pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa'i so sor snang ba tha dad pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: He says, ‚ÄúThe appearance of the difference of form, etc.,‚Äù

original: sngon po dang ser po la sogs pa yang thams cad du tha dad par so sor snang bar gyur par mthong ba yin no //
analyzed: sngon po dang ser po la sogs pa yang thams cad du tha dad par so sor snang bar gyur par mthong ba yin no //
translated: and so on. The appearance of the difference of blue, yellow, etc., is seen everywhere.

original: de ltar ni 'gyur na cha shas kyi yul tha dad pa med pa'i phyir dang / dbang po gcig gis gzung bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir so sor snang ba tha dad pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar ni 'gyur na cha shas kyi yul tha dad pa med pa'i phyir dang / dbang po gcig gis gzung bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir so sor snang ba tha dad pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If that were so, then the appearance of the difference would not be because the different parts of the object do not exist and because they are apprehended by a single sense faculty.

original: yul tha dad pa med kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: yul tha dad pa med kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: He says, ‚ÄúEven though the object does not exist as different,‚Äù and so on.

original: yul tha dad pa med pa dri dang ro la sogs pa tha dad pa so sor snang pa nyid dang / rlung tsha ba'i reg bya la sogs pa dbang @167a * //
analyzed: yul tha dad pa med pa dri dang ro la sogs pa tha dad pa so sor snang pa nyid dang / rlung tsha ba'i reg bya la sogs pa dbang @167a * //
translated: Even though the object does not exist as different, the appearance of the difference of smell, taste, etc., and the tactile sensation of hot wind, etc., are seen.

original: po gcig gi gzung bar bya ba yin du zin kyang tha dad par rtogs pa de'i phyir 'di ni yongs su spangs pa yin no //
analyzed: po gcig gi gzung bar bya ba yin du zin kyang tha dad par rtogs pa de'i phyir 'di ni yongs su spangs pa yin no //
translated: Even if it were the object of a single cognition, it would be cognized as distinct. Therefore, this is completely rejected.

original: bsags pa'i rgyu bstan pa ni de nyid kyang mngon sum gyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: bsags pa'i rgyu bstan pa ni de nyid kyang mngon sum gyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: The cause of accumulation is taught: ‚ÄúThat is also direct perception,‚Äù and so on.

original: dngos po de dag nyid kyang mngon sum yin no //
analyzed: dngos po de dag nyid kyang mngon sum yin no //
translated: Those very things are direct perception.

original: mngon sum nyid ni gang gzhan gyi ngo bos dben pa ni rang nyid kyi ngo bos blo la yang dag par 'jog par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: mngon sum nyid ni gang gzhan gyi ngo bos dben pa ni rang nyid kyi ngo bos blo la yang dag par 'jog par byed pa yin no //
translated: Direct perception is that which, being devoid of the nature of another, correctly establishes the cognition by its own nature.

original: 'dir yang ji srid du bum pa rin med par 'dir su zhig 'tshong bar byed par 'dod pa de bzhin du rang gi ngo bo dang bcas pa gsal ba rin med par ster ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dir yang ji srid du bum pa rin med par 'dir su zhig 'tshong bar byed par 'dod pa de bzhin du rang gi ngo bo dang bcas pa gsal ba rin med par ster ba ni ma yin te /
translated: Here also, as long as a pot is not sold here without price, in the same way, a manifest thing with its own nature is not given without price.

original: mngon sum gyi yul 'tshong bar 'dod pa yin no zhes rgyal po'i gtam dang 'di mtshungs so //
analyzed: mngon sum gyi yul 'tshong bar 'dod pa yin no zhes rgyal po'i gtam dang 'di mtshungs so //
translated: One who desires the object of direct perception is like the king‚Äôs story.

original: de ni de ltar yin na gal te cha shas med na ji ltar 'di khyad par gyi blo sgra dang bum pa la 'jug pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: de ni de ltar yin na gal te cha shas med na ji ltar 'di khyad par gyi blo sgra dang bum pa la 'jug pa yin zhe na /
translated: If it is so, then if there is no part, how does this cognition of difference engage sound and pot?

original: de dag gis ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de dag gis ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: He says, ‚ÄúBy those . . . ‚Äù

original: gang gi tshe blo dang sgra tha dad pa dag cha shas yod pa dang nye par gyur pa de'i tshe de yang bsal ba yin no zhes rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: gang gi tshe blo dang sgra tha dad pa dag cha shas yod pa dang nye par gyur pa de'i tshe de yang bsal ba yin no zhes rtogs par bya'o //
translated: When cognition and sound are different, and there is a part that is near, then that is also excluded.

original: de ltar na blo dang sgra dang yod par sgrub par byed pa yin na 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa nye bar bkod pas shin tu bsal zin to //
analyzed: de ltar na blo dang sgra dang yod par sgrub par byed pa yin na 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa nye bar bkod pas shin tu bsal zin to //
translated: Thus, if it is established that cognition and sound exist, then by positing the past and future, it is completely excluded.

original: ma grub pa'i mtha' smra ba de dag gis sgrub par 'dod na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: ma grub pa'i mtha' smra ba de dag gis sgrub par 'dod na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Those who propound the unestablished thesis say, ‚ÄúIf it is established . . . ‚Äù

original: gang zhig mngon sum gyi don yin na 'ga' zhig g-yogs pa de'i gzugs nye bar mi mtshon pa ni mthong ba ma yin no //
analyzed: gang zhig mngon sum gyi don yin na 'ga' zhig g-yogs pa de'i gzugs nye bar mi mtshon pa ni mthong ba ma yin no //
translated: If it is an object of direct perception, then if it is covered by something, its form is not represented and it is not seen.

original: de'i gzhan yod pa zhig yod na ni shes pas dmigs par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: de'i gzhan yod pa zhig yod na ni shes pas dmigs par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: If the existence of the other existed, it would be perceived by cognition.

original: de lta na yang de sgrub par byed pa'i rtogs khas ma blangs par mngon sum gyis gzung bar bya ba ma yin pa shes pa gzhan gyis go bar bya bar rigs pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta na yang de sgrub par byed pa'i rtogs khas ma blangs par mngon sum gyis gzung bar bya ba ma yin pa shes pa gzhan gyis go bar bya bar rigs pa yin no //
translated: Even so, it is not reasonable that what is not apprehended by perception should be understood by another cognition, without accepting a proof of that.

original: de ni de ltar 'gyur ba ni ma yin gyi mngon sum du 'dod pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de ni de ltar 'gyur ba ni ma yin gyi mngon sum du 'dod pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is not so, but is accepted as perception,

original: mngon sum ma yin pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: mngon sum ma yin pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: he says, ‚ÄúIt is not perception, etc.

original: gal te mngon sum ma yin par 'dod pa yin pa de lta na 'di ni tshad ma ma yin pa de lta na 'bras bu cung zad kyang med do //
analyzed: gal te mngon sum ma yin par 'dod pa yin pa de lta na 'di ni tshad ma ma yin pa de lta na 'bras bu cung zad kyang med do //
translated: If it is accepted as not being perception, then it is not a valid cognition, and so it has no effect at all.

original: gnyis ka 'ang yod pa yin na gang gis rjes su dpag par 'gyur /
analyzed: gnyis ka 'ang yod pa yin na gang gis rjes su dpag par 'gyur /
translated: If both existed, then what would be inferred?

original: de yang tshad ma yang med par gyur pa ni 'di khas blangs par rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de yang tshad ma yang med par gyur pa ni 'di khas blangs par rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: And it is not reasonable to accept that, since it would be without a valid cognition.

original: de'i phyir gzugs dag las @167b gzhan pa'i bum pa'i cha shas ni gnas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir gzugs dag las @167b gzhan pa'i bum pa'i cha shas ni gnas pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the part of the pot that is different from the forms is not a real entity.

original: rnal ma'i mjug bsdu ba ni de ltar na de srid du zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: rnal ma'i mjug bsdu ba ni de ltar na de srid du zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: The conclusion of the natural [argument] is stated with ‚ÄúThus, as long as . . .‚Äù and so forth.

original: blo dang sgra la sogs pa tsam gyis dngos po med pas yod pa ma yin no zhes bya bar ma grub po //
analyzed: blo dang sgra la sogs pa tsam gyis dngos po med pas yod pa ma yin no zhes bya bar ma grub po //
translated: Since the nonexistence of things is merely the mind and sound, it is not established that they do not exist.

original: de yang tha dad pa dang tha dad pa med pa dag gis dngos po tha dad pa dang tha dad pa med pa yin no zhes de skad du bshad pa'i rnam par bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: de yang tha dad pa dang tha dad pa med pa dag gis dngos po tha dad pa dang tha dad pa med pa yin no zhes de skad du bshad pa'i rnam par bstan pa yin no //
translated: Moreover, the existence and nonexistence of things are explained as being due to their difference and nondifference. This is the presentation.

original: blo dang sgra'i dngos po med pa dag gis med pa'i tha snyad kyi rgyu mtshan du 'gyur ba ma yin pa de ni de nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: blo dang sgra'i dngos po med pa dag gis med pa'i tha snyad kyi rgyu mtshan du 'gyur ba ma yin pa de ni de nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: Since the nonexistence of the mind and sound is not the reason for the convention of nonexistence, [the root text] says ‚ÄúFor that reason . . .‚Äù and so forth.

original: gang gi tshe blo dang sgra ni yod pa'i tha snyad du byed pa'i rgyu bkag pa de'i tshe med par gyur kyang med pa'i tha snyad kyi rgyu yod pa ma yin no zhes bya bar grub pa yin no //
analyzed: gang gi tshe blo dang sgra ni yod pa'i tha snyad du byed pa'i rgyu bkag pa de'i tshe med par gyur kyang med pa'i tha snyad kyi rgyu yod pa ma yin no zhes bya bar grub pa yin no //
translated: When the cause of the convention of existence is refuted in regard to the cognition and the word, then even though they become nonexistent, the cause of the convention of nonexistence does not exist.

original: de ltar de srid du blo dang sgra dag la yod pa'i tha snyad dang med pa'i tha snyad kyi rgyu mtshan bkag pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar de srid du blo dang sgra dag la yod pa'i tha snyad dang med pa'i tha snyad kyi rgyu mtshan bkag pa yin no //
translated: Thus, the reason for the convention of existence and the convention of nonexistence in regard to the cognition and the word is refuted.

original: don byed pa'i shes pa ni /
analyzed: don byed pa'i shes pa ni /
translated: The cognition of the performance of function

original: don byed pa'i zhes smos te /
analyzed: don byed pa'i zhes smos te /
translated: The performance of function is mentioned.

original: yod pa'i tha snyad tsam sgrub par byed pa yin gyi yod pa tha dad pa dang tha mi dad pa'i tha snyad du byed pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: yod pa'i tha snyad tsam sgrub par byed pa yin gyi yod pa tha dad pa dang tha mi dad pa'i tha snyad du byed pa ni ma yin no //
translated: It is the establishment of the mere convention of existence, but it is not the convention of existence as different or non-different.

original: rgyu ci yin zhe na /
analyzed: rgyu ci yin zhe na /
translated: What is the reason?

original: gcig la yang don du ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: gcig la yang don du ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: It is said: ‚ÄúEven though one is many, etc.‚Äù

original: gcig gis kyang don du ma'i bya ba byed par 'gyur ba yin te /
analyzed: gcig gis kyang don du ma'i bya ba byed par 'gyur ba yin te /
translated: Even one performs the function of many.

original: dper na mar mes shes pa skyed pa dang sdong bu sreg pa dang 'bar ba gzhan skyed pa dang snang ba dang tsha bar byed pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na mar mes shes pa skyed pa dang sdong bu sreg pa dang 'bar ba gzhan skyed pa dang snang ba dang tsha bar byed pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, a lamp produces a cognition, burns a wick, produces a flame, and illuminates and warms.

original: de ltar de srid du gcig gis du ma'i don byed par 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: de ltar de srid du gcig gis du ma'i don byed par 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: In this way, one thing can perform many functions.

original: mang po rnams kyang gcig gi don byed pa bstan pas mig la sogs pa du mas kyang rnam par shes pa gcig skyed par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: mang po rnams kyang gcig gi don byed pa bstan pas mig la sogs pa du mas kyang rnam par shes pa gcig skyed par byed pa yin te /
translated: Since it has been shown that many things can perform the function of one thing, many things such as the eye, etc., produce one cognition.

original: de'i phyir ji ltar don byed pa tha dad pa dang tha mi dad par grub pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir ji ltar don byed pa tha dad pa dang tha mi dad par grub pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is established that the function is both different and not different.

original: 'dir gzhan dag na re gal te zhes bya ba nas mi smra'i zhes bya ba'i bar du zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: 'dir gzhan dag na re gal te zhes bya ba nas mi smra'i zhes bya ba'i bar du zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Here, some say, ‚ÄúIf you say that the eye sees, etc.,

original: khyed kyi don byed pa tsam gyis yod pa tha dad pa zhes ni mi smra'i 'on kyang don gyi byed pa'i khyad par tha dad pa yin no //
analyzed: khyed kyi don byed pa tsam gyis yod pa tha dad pa zhes ni mi smra'i 'on kyang don gyi byed pa'i khyad par tha dad pa yin no //
translated: we do not say that existence is different by the mere performance of a function, but rather the difference in the performance of a function is different.

original: de bzhin du khyad par mthong ba ni don byed pa gang yin pa de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /üîΩgang gi don byed pa la lar dngos po 'ga' zhig kyang ma mthong la dngos po las gzhan pa'i dngos po las gzhan @168a * //
analyzed: de bzhin du khyad par mthong ba ni don byed pa gang yin pa de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te / gang gi don byed pa la lar dngos po 'ga' zhig kyang ma mthong la dngos po las gzhan pa'i dngos po las gzhan @168a * //
translated: So too, seeing a difference is stated in ‚ÄúWhatever performs a function . . .‚Äù

original: ma yin pa mthong la de ni yod pa tha mi dad pa sgrub par byed kyi gzhan du ni ma yin no zhes bya ba phyogs snga ma'o //
analyzed: ma yin pa mthong la de ni yod pa tha mi dad pa sgrub par byed kyi gzhan du ni ma yin no zhes bya ba phyogs snga ma'o //
translated: The opponent‚Äôs position is that wherever a function is performed, one does not see any thing, and one sees that which is not different from a thing.

original: grub pa'i mtha' smra bas /
analyzed: grub pa'i mtha' smra bas /
translated: The Proponents of Inherent Existence say,

original: de ltar don gzhan grub pa ni yod mod kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de ltar don gzhan grub pa ni yod mod kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: ‚ÄúAlthough the establishment of a different object exists . . .‚Äù

original: khyod kyi don gzhan grub kyang cha shas grub pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: khyod kyi don gzhan grub kyang cha shas grub pa ni ma yin no //
translated: You say that although a different object is established, a part is not established.

original: de ni de ltar 'gyur na cha shas med pa de lta na 'di'i don byed pa tha mi dad pa yin no zhes ga las shes she na /
analyzed: de ni de ltar 'gyur na cha shas med pa de lta na 'di'i don byed pa tha mi dad pa yin no zhes ga las shes she na /
translated: If that were so, how could you know that a partless thing performs a different function?

original: dper na rkyen gyis 'dus byas pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: dper na rkyen gyis 'dus byas pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: For example, it is said, ‚ÄúConditioned phenomena are produced by conditions . . .‚Äù

original: 'dus byas pa'i rgyun ni ji lta ji ltar rkyen gzhan gyi rgyun yod pa de lta de ltar na rang bzhin gyis tha dad pa skye ba yin te /
analyzed: 'dus byas pa'i rgyun ni ji lta ji ltar rkyen gzhan gyi rgyun yod pa de lta de ltar na rang bzhin gyis tha dad pa skye ba yin te /
translated: The continuum of the conditioned arises as essentially different in dependence on the existence of the continuum of other conditions.

original: rang bzhin tha dad pa dang 'brel pa dang rang gi don byed pa tha mi dad pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rang bzhin tha dad pa dang 'brel pa dang rang gi don byed pa tha mi dad pa ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not that the essentially different is related and that the performance of its own function is not different.

original: dpe ci yin zhe na /
analyzed: dpe ci yin zhe na /
translated: What is the example?

original: srub shing bsrubs pa'i gnas skabs zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: srub shing bsrubs pa'i gnas skabs zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: It is said, ‚ÄúThe state of the churning stick,‚Äù and so on.

original: dper na grub shing bsrubs pa las byung ba'i me de dang de ni rkyen gyis 'gyur ba yin te /
analyzed: dper na grub shing bsrubs pa las byung ba'i me de dang de ni rkyen gyis 'gyur ba yin te /
translated: For example, the fire that arises from the churning stick is a transformation of conditions.

original: spra ba dang rta sbangs dang rtsva dang shing sreg pa'i nus pa tha dad par 'gyur ba bzhin no //
analyzed: spra ba dang rta sbangs dang rtsva dang shing sreg pa'i nus pa tha dad par 'gyur ba bzhin no //
translated: It has the ability to burn grass, wood, and so on, which is different from the churning stick.

original: de ltar na srub shing bsrubs pa las de ma thag tu spra ba tsam sreg par nus pa de ltar ches 'phel ba rnam par 'jig pa nye bar skyed pa las nus pa phul du byung ba rta sbangs dang rtsa ba dang sbun pa dang lo ma la
analyzed: de ltar na srub shing bsrubs pa las de ma thag tu spra ba tsam sreg par nus pa de ltar ches 'phel ba rnam par 'jig pa nye bar skyed pa las nus pa phul du byung ba rta sbangs dang rtsa ba dang sbun pa dang lo ma la
translated: Thus, the churning stick is able to immediately burn the cotton wool, and in the same way, the extreme increase of the fire generated by the destruction of the cotton wool produces the excellent ability to burn the horse, the root, the chaff and the leaves.

original: sogs pa'i myur du 'gyur bar byed pa yongs su bsags pa las rab tu skyes pa 'bar ba'i dus su gzhan gyis kyang shing gi tshogs sreg par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: sogs pa'i myur du 'gyur bar byed pa yongs su bsags pa las rab tu skyes pa 'bar ba'i dus su gzhan gyis kyang shing gi tshogs sreg par byed pa yin te /
translated: Thus, just as a churning stick is rubbed, it is able to burn merely by the friction of the churning stick. In the same way, the increase of the power of the fire that arises from the proximate generation of destruction produces the most excellent power, and the fire that arises from the collection of the rapid transformation of the chaff, the roots, the husks, the leaves, and so on, burns the collection of wood.

original: de bzhin du bsgrub par bya ba'i don gyi mjug bsdu ba ni /
analyzed: de bzhin du bsgrub par bya ba'i don gyi mjug bsdu ba ni /
translated: In the same way, the conclusion of the meaning of the object of proof is

original: rkyen ji lta ba bzhin du zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: rkyen ji lta ba bzhin du zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: stated with ‚Äújust as conditions are‚Äù and so on.üîΩJust as the fire is able to apply the most excellent power of the conditions, and the result is different, in the same way, the various different things

original: me ji lta ba de lta bu'i rkyen nye bar sbyor bar nus pa phul du 'byung ba dang 'brel ba'i 'bras bu tha dad pa de bzhin du snal ma la sogs pa yang de dang de'i rkyen du nye bar btags pas dngos po tha dad pa sna tshogs
analyzed: me ji lta ba de lta bu'i rkyen nye bar sbyor bar nus pa phul du 'byung ba dang 'brel ba'i 'bras bu tha dad pa de bzhin du snal ma la sogs pa yang de dang de'i rkyen du nye bar btags pas dngos po tha dad pa sna tshogs
translated: are designated as the conditions of the thread and so on.

original: pa'i 'bras bu ngo bo nye bar skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: pa'i 'bras bu ngo bo nye bar skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The effect of the cloth arises in the nature of the threads.

original: de lta na yang gzhan nyid kyis gzugs nyid la sogs pa gang dang gang skud pa bkal ba'i gnas skabs dang / dru bu la sogs pa'i gnas skabs kyang gzhan yin te /
analyzed: de lta na yang gzhan nyid kyis gzugs nyid la sogs pa gang dang gang skud pa bkal ba'i gnas skabs dang / dru bu la sogs pa'i gnas skabs kyang gzhan yin te /
translated: Even so, the cloth itself, etc., are different from the threads, because the state of the threads being woven and the state of the cloth, etc., are different.

original: zheng dang chur gnas pa la sogs pa'i gnas skabs la brten pas blo dang sgra gzhan nyid tha dad pa dag cha shas kyis grub pa dgag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: zheng dang chur gnas pa la sogs pa'i gnas skabs la brten pas blo dang sgra gzhan nyid tha dad pa dag cha shas kyis grub pa dgag pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to refute the establishment of the difference of cognition and word by parts, he says,

original: de dag gis ni zhes @168b bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de dag gis ni zhes @168b bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: ‚ÄúEven so, the difference of cognition and word are not established.‚Äù

original: don byed pa tha dad pa cha shas su grub pa bsal ba nyid kyis blo dang sgra'i tha dad pa grub pa de'i rgyu mtshan nyid kyang bsal ba yin no //
analyzed: don byed pa tha dad pa cha shas su grub pa bsal ba nyid kyis blo dang sgra'i tha dad pa grub pa de'i rgyu mtshan nyid kyang bsal ba yin no //
translated: The refutation of the establishment of the difference of cognition and word by parts is implied by the refutation of the establishment of the difference of the function of the object by parts.

original: de lta na yang bkal ba dang sna la ma las snam bu la sogs pa las de ltar bskyed pa'i blo dang sgra tha dad pa ni snal ma'i de'i rang bzhin dang rjes su 'brel ba yin no //
analyzed: de lta na yang bkal ba dang sna la ma las snam bu la sogs pa las de ltar bskyed pa'i blo dang sgra tha dad pa ni snal ma'i de'i rang bzhin dang rjes su 'brel ba yin no //
translated: Even so, the cognition and the word that generate the cloth, etc. from the threads, etc. are different, and they are related to the nature of the threads, etc.

original: de ltar de srid du don byed pa med pa na tha dad pa dang tha dad pa med pa'i tha snyad kyi rgyu bkag pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar de srid du don byed pa med pa na tha dad pa dang tha dad pa med pa'i tha snyad kyi rgyu bkag pa yin no //
translated: Thus, when there is no causal efficiency, the cause of the convention of difference and non-difference is refuted.

original: mdun na gnas pa nyid kyi rkyen med pa ni /
analyzed: mdun na gnas pa nyid kyi rkyen med pa ni /
translated: The absence of the condition of being in front is stated in the line:

original: de la don byed pa la yod pa nyid kyi tha snyad grub par smras pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de la don byed pa la yod pa nyid kyi tha snyad grub par smras pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: ‚ÄúThe convention of existence is established in causal efficiency.‚Äù

original: 'di'i don ni go bar zad do //
analyzed: 'di'i don ni go bar zad do //
translated: The meaning of this is self-evident.

original: de dag nyid rjes su smra ba ni de ni bden no zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de dag nyid rjes su smra ba ni de ni bden no zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: The response to that is stated in the line: ‚ÄúThat is true.‚Äù

original: de 'dir de dag gnyi ga yang bshad par bya'o //üîΩlhag ma bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de 'dir de dag gnyi ga yang bshad par bya'o // lhag ma bstan pa ni /
translated: Both of these should be explained here.üîΩThe teaching of the remainder is stated in the line:

original: log pa de nyid la zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: log pa de nyid la zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: ‚ÄúThe error is in reality.‚Äù

original: dmigs pa'i rig byar gyur ba las mi dmigs pa nyid kyis med pa yin na dngos po'i don byed pa de nyid grub par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i rig byar gyur ba las mi dmigs pa nyid kyis med pa yin na dngos po'i don byed pa de nyid grub par mi 'gyur te /
translated: If it is non-observation of something that is an observed object, then the very thing that performs the function of an existent thing would not be established.

original: yod pa'i tha snyad kyi rgyu mtshan gang zhig yin /
analyzed: yod pa'i tha snyad kyi rgyu mtshan gang zhig yin /
translated: What is the reason for the convention of existence?

original: 'dir yang mi dmigs pa gdon mi za bar khas blangs pa yin pa de bstan pa ni /
analyzed: 'dir yang mi dmigs pa gdon mi za bar khas blangs pa yin pa de bstan pa ni /
translated: Here, it is taught that non-observation is definitely accepted:

original: de la yang 'di mi 'dod na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de la yang 'di mi 'dod na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: If that is not accepted, then, etc.

original: gang gi tshe nus pa'i dngos po gzhan rjes su grub pa de'i tshe shing ngam skam pa la thug pas ji skad bshad pa'i mi dmigs pa'i rjes su 'brang ba yin no //
analyzed: gang gi tshe nus pa'i dngos po gzhan rjes su grub pa de'i tshe shing ngam skam pa la thug pas ji skad bshad pa'i mi dmigs pa'i rjes su 'brang ba yin no //
translated: When the establishment of another thing that is able is subsequent, then, as explained, the non-observation that is based on a tree or a dry piece of wood is followed.

original: de ltar ni 'gyur na nus pa med pa'i mi dmigs pa'i shes pa yin pa des na yod pa'i dngos po med pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar ni 'gyur na nus pa med pa'i mi dmigs pa'i shes pa yin pa des na yod pa'i dngos po med pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If that is the case, then the cognition of non-observation that is not able is the non-existence of an existent thing.

original: nus pa 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: nus pa 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: If that is said, then ‚Äúthis ability,‚Äù etc. is stated.

original: gal te nus pa'i dngos po med pas mi dmigs par shes pa yin na yod pa'i dngos po med kyang mi dmigs pa nyid ci ste shes par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: gal te nus pa'i dngos po med pas mi dmigs par shes pa yin na yod pa'i dngos po med kyang mi dmigs pa nyid ci ste shes par mi 'gyur /
translated: If you understand non-apprehension because of the non-existence of the entity of potentiality, then why don‚Äôt you understand that even though the entity of existence does not exist, it is non-apprehended?

original: de lta na yang nus pa'i mtshan nyid ni yod pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta na yang nus pa'i mtshan nyid ni yod pa yin no //
translated: Even so, the characteristic of potentiality exists.

original: gal te de lta na yin na de la nyes pa ci zhig yod ce na /
analyzed: gal te de lta na yin na de la nyes pa ci zhig yod ce na /
translated: If that is so, what is the fault in that?

original: de lta na yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de lta na yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Even so, etc.

original: gang snga ma'i rang bzhin mi dmigs par bshad pa dang de'i nus pa mi dmigs pa la bye brag ci zhig yod /
analyzed: gang snga ma'i rang bzhin mi dmigs par bshad pa dang de'i nus pa mi dmigs pa la bye brag ci zhig yod /
translated: What is the difference between the non-apprehension of the former nature and the non-apprehension of its potentiality?

original: de lta na yang rang bzhin gyis phan tshun nus pa de las cis ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: de lta na yang rang bzhin gyis phan tshun nus pa de las cis ma yin zhe na /
translated: Even so, why is there no mutual potentiality by intrinsic reality?

original: de ni dmigs pa'i rig byar gyur ba las zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de ni dmigs pa'i rig byar gyur ba las zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: That is, from that which is the object of apprehension, etc.

original: gang gis @169a * //
analyzed: gang gis @169a * //
translated: By what?

original: dmigs pa'i rig byar gyur ba las nus pa mi dmigs pa de ni rang bzhin gyis mi dmigs pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i rig byar gyur ba las nus pa mi dmigs pa de ni rang bzhin gyis mi dmigs pa nyid yin no //
translated: The non-apprehension of potentiality from that which is the object of apprehension is just the non-apprehension by intrinsic reality.

original: de'i phyir sngar gyi dmigs pa las tha dad pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir sngar gyi dmigs pa las tha dad pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is not different from the former object.

original: gang gi phyir tha dad pa med pa de'i phyir 'ba' zhig tu byas pa la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir tha dad pa med pa de'i phyir 'ba' zhig tu byas pa la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Since it is not different, therefore, it is said to be only, etc.

original: gang la 'ba' zhig tu med pa'i tha snyad du khas blangs pa yin no zhes bya ba de la thams cad du ji skad bshad pa'i mi dmigs pa kho nas khas blang bar bya'o //
analyzed: gang la 'ba' zhig tu med pa'i tha snyad du khas blangs pa yin no zhes bya ba de la thams cad du ji skad bshad pa'i mi dmigs pa kho nas khas blang bar bya'o //
translated: In regard to that which is accepted as the convention of non-existence, everything is to be accepted just as explained above, by non-apprehension alone.

original: gal te yang 'ga' zhig tu mi dmigs pa tshad mar byed pa yin pa de'i tshe 'ga' zhig tu yang ma yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: gal te yang 'ga' zhig tu mi dmigs pa tshad mar byed pa yin pa de'i tshe 'ga' zhig tu yang ma yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: If, however, non-apprehension is made valid in some cases, then it is not in any case, etc.

original: thams cad du khas blang bar bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: thams cad du khas blang bar bya ba ma yin te /
translated: It is not to be accepted in all cases,

original: dmigs pa'i rig byar gyur ba las mi dmigs pa yod pa'i khyad par gyi dngos po med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i rig byar gyur ba las mi dmigs pa yod pa'i khyad par gyi dngos po med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because non-apprehension of what is capable of being perceived is not a specific non-entity.

original: ci ste la lar khas blang bar bya ba ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci ste la lar khas blang bar bya ba ma yin zhe na /
translated: If, however, it is not to be accepted in some cases,

original: de gzhan du yang de lta bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de gzhan du yang de lta bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: then it is like that in other cases, etc.

original: khas blangs pa'i don las tha dad pa don gzhan dmigs pa'i rig byar gyur ba las mi dmigs pa'i khyad par yin na ni don de yang med pa'i tha snyad kyi yul can gyis de yang khyab pa grub pas rnam pa de lta bu thams cad ces bya
analyzed: khas blangs pa'i don las tha dad pa don gzhan dmigs pa'i rig byar gyur ba las mi dmigs pa'i khyad par yin na ni don de yang med pa'i tha snyad kyi yul can gyis de yang khyab pa grub pas rnam pa de lta bu thams cad ces bya
